# Weekly Audit Report Template

- **Cadence:** Publish every Monday based on activity from the previous week (Monday–Sunday).
- **Distribution:** Share in GitHub Discussions (#announcements) and cross-post to social channels or the project newsletter.

## Summary
- Highlight the top three community wins or insights from discussions.
- Note any trending topics or blockers raised by contributors.

## New Contributors
- Welcome first-time contributors and link to their pull requests or discussions.

## Key Issues
- `good first issue` highlights with short descriptions.
- `boa primeira contribuição` opportunities localized for Portuguese-speaking contributors.

## Discussion Recap
- Link to the most active discussion threads and summarize outcomes or next steps.

## Upcoming Focus
- Outline goals for the coming week (maintenance tasks, release checkpoints, events).

## Call to Action
- Promote the next community sync, office hours, or request for feedback.
